channel.title: Making shops?

item.title: Making shops?
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

[quote=“v0lcanicf0x, post:2, topic:115354”]clk shop.fag fil, then typw tis

sop = 5 3434 52342 4545 3463 2342 4523

jst typ numbas lik i do[/quote]Read the TOS and talk like a normal human being, your post didn’t help anyone, if you want a shop, go to shops.cfg and here’s some info:

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = SHOP NUMBER HERE @red@NAME_OF_SHOP 1 1 ITEM ID HERE ITEM AMOUNT HEREThat’s the cfg part.

Read full topic
